variants.Description in input context: Mutant A53T ␣-synuclein overexpression leads to mitochondrial dysfunction.

Material used.Material Source: Cell cultures of primary cortical neurons
Material used.Description: Primary neuronal cultures were transfected with mutant A53T ␣-synuclein.

Readout description.Result Description: Mitochondrial dysfunction was assessed using Mass Spectrometry (MS) and Electron Microscopy (EM).

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were conducted with three independent neuronal cultures.

Technical replicates.Technical replicates: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.
Technical replicates.Description: MS and EM analyses were repeated for technical reproducibility.

Basic positive control.Description: Analysis of wild-type neuronal cultures with normal ␣-synuclein expression.

Basic negative control.Description: Analysis of neuronal cultures treated with vehicle or non-specific inhibitors.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA with Tukey's post-hoc test for multiple comparisons.
